title: Indian Polity, 4E- Laxmikanth [Epub & Mobi] [StormRG]
description:
Author: M Laxmikanth 
Paperback: 694 pages
Publisher: McGraw Hill Education India Private Limited (August 7, 2013)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 9351342670
ISBN-13: 978-9351342670
Format: Retail Epub and mobi
Reader Required: 
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Mobi- Kindle App, Calibre, MoonReader for Android

NOTE: no PDF available. If you want the book to scroll like a PDF, use the mobi file in Kindle or either in Calibre
This is the eBook of the printed book and may not include any media, website access codes, or print supplements that may come packaged with the bound book.


Tested on the above readers with no problems on laptop and Android tablet. Please allow a couple seconds for the seedboxes to kick in, then it should move pretty quick.
Hope it helps in your studies. Go for it! :D

___________________________________________________________________________________


It is highly acclaimed and indispensable manual for Civil Service aspirants, academicians, researchers and those with an abiding interest in understanding the features and trends of the Indian Political cystem. This revised and updated edition has been compiled and presented in a highly readable format.
